resources.string: You are playing against the droid
Human (Player 1) Wins! Click on Reset to play again
Droid Wins! Click on Reset to play again
Player 2 Wins! Click on Reset to play again
It\'s a tie! Click on Reset to play again

NOT EVERYONE CAN CLAIM THAT THEY BLOCKED STEPHEN CURRY FROM MAKING A SHOT. WILL YOU DO THE IMPOSSIBLE?

 HUMAN vs. DROID GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS
 You are LeBron James (X's). You need to stop Stephen Curry (O's) from aligning three of his pieces in a row.
 Just like basic tic-tac-toe, whoever gets three pieces in a row horizontally, vertically or diagonally first wins!


HUMAN vs. HUMAN GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS
 Player 1 is LeBron, while player 2 is Steph. Settle which basketball superstar is superior once and for all in
 this fun multiplayer game mode!


HAVE FUN!
